description.excerpt: lots of com.clarkparsia. / com.mindswap. are refactored into openllet.* to avoid conflicts and have typing changed a lot.

NB, the Protege plugin need a Protege that work with an 5.1.X version of the OWL-API, so the main branch of Protege isn't compatible with Openllet. 
Fullify strong typing in openllet core (2.7.X).
Openllet is an OWL 2 reasoner in Java, build on top of Pellet.

excerpt.body: Version 2.6.3 for bugs corrections, up-to-date dependencies, speed-up improvement and more tests.
excerpt.name: Release 2.6.3

excerpt.body:
Version 2.6.2 for bugs corrections, up-to-date dependencies, speed-up improvement and more tests.
There is a change in behaviour in the result of computation of 'equivalent properties', complex equivalent can be return now: https://github.com/owlcs/owlapi/issues/692
excerpt.name: Release 2.6.2

excerpt.body: Version 2.6.1 for bug correction and up-to-date dependencies.

This is the first release that use Jena 3 & owlapi 5.
There is many bugs into the modularity components.
